Articles.Content: I have a pilot in career mode and have done everything up to and including planting a flag on the Mun and returning to Kerbin. It seems he's only level one (1 star and only has SAS prograde & retrograde). The log entries list: Orbit around Mun and Plant flag on Mun. It seems like he should be level 2 or maybe even level 3. My astronaut complex is level 2 if that matters. Am I wrong or missing something?

https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Experience

 

Specifically, this line: 

Quote

Additionally, experience from a given celestial body is only granted for the most valuable achievement and is not cumulative, so orbiting the Mun (3 XP) and planting a flag on it (5 XP) will only ever grant a total of 5 XP, not 8 or more (even if done on separate missions).

 

Level 2 requires a total of 8XP, so your pilot in question is 3XP shy of Level 2.

 

Edit:  Oh, and welcome to the forums!

Edited March 25, 2018 by klesh
Landing on Mun and Minmus, then a quick jump out to interplanetary space and back will put your Kerbals to 3 stars.

20 minutes ago, klesh said:

https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Experience

 

Specifically, this line: 

 

Level 2 requires a total of 8XP, so your pilot in question is 3XP shy of Level 2.

 

Edit:  Oh, and welcome to the forums!

I saw the wiki but was confused how the points add up. Thanks for confirming I'm where I should be. And thanks for the welcome.
